import React from 'react' import Products from '../products' import { Row, Col, ListGroup, Button, Image } from 'react-bootstrap' import { ListGroupItem } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' export default function ProductDeails({ match }) { const product = Products.find((p) => p._id === match.params.id) return ( <>

{product.name}
) }
